TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Lazy`1<T> extends System.Object
generic <typename T> public ref class Lazy

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 正在延遲初始化的物件類型。

span.span: The type of object that is being lazily initialized.

summary.span: 提供延遲初始設定的支援。

span.span: Provides support for lazy initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 延後建立大型或需要大量資源的物件或執行需要大量資源的工作，尤其是這類的建立或執行可能不會發生在程式的存留期間使用延遲初始設定。Use lazy initialization to defer the creation of a large or resource-intensive object, or the execution of a resource-intensive task, particularly when such creation or execution might not occur during the lifetime of the program. 若要準備延遲初始設定，您建立的執行個體。To prepare for lazy initialization, you create an instance of . 類型引數您所建立的物件會指定您想要延遲初始化的物件型別。The type argument of the object that you create specifies the type of the object that you want to initialize lazily. 您用來建立建構函式物件會決定初始化的特性。The constructor that you use to create the object determines the characteristics of the initialization. 延遲初始化會在第一次存取 屬性時發生。Lazy initialization occurs the first time the property is accessed. 在大部分情況下，選擇一個建構函式取決於您對兩個問題的答案：In most cases, choosing a constructor depends on your answers to two questions: - 會從多個執行緒存取延遲初始化的物件嗎？Will the lazily initialized object be accessed from more than one thread? 如果是這樣，物件可能會在任何執行緒上建立它。If so, the object might create it on any thread. 您可以使用其中一個簡單的建構函式的預設行為是建立安全執行緒物件，因此無論多少個執行緒嘗試存取它建立延遲具現化物件的該只有一個執行個體。You can use one of the simple constructors whose default behavior is to create a thread-safe object, so that only one instance of the lazily instantiated object is created no matter how many threads try to access it. 若要建立不是安全執行緒的物件，您必須使用可讓您不指定任何執行緒安全的建構函式。To create a object that is not thread safe, you must use a constructor that enables you to specify no thread safety. > [!CAUTION] > 讓物件具備執行緒安全，並無法保護延遲初始化的物件。Making the object thread safe does not protect the lazily initialized object. 如果多個執行緒可以存取的延遲初始化的物件，您必須使其屬性和方法進行多執行緒存取的安全。If multiple threads can access the lazily initialized object, you must make its properties and methods safe for multithreaded access. - 延遲初始設定是否需要大量程式碼，或延遲初始化的物件是否有預設建構函式不需要而且不會擲回例外狀況的所有內容？Does lazy initialization require a lot of code, or does the lazily initialized object have a default constructor that does everything you need and doesn't throw exceptions? 如果您要撰寫初始化程式碼，或需要處理的例外狀況，請使用其中一個會採用的 factory 方法的建構函式。If you need to write initialization code or if exceptions need to be handled, use one of the constructors that takes a factory method. Factory 方法中撰寫您的初始化程式碼。Write your initialization code in the factory method. 下表顯示的建構函式，若要選擇，根據這兩個因素：The following table shows which constructor to choose, based on these two factors: |物件會由存取Object will be accessed by|如果不不需要任何初始設定程式碼 （預設建構函式），使用If no initialization code is required (default constructor), use|如果需要初始化程式碼，使用If initialization code is required, use| |--------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |多個執行緒Multiple threads||| |一個執行緒One thread| 具有`isThreadSafe`設定為`false`。 with `isThreadSafe` set to `false`.| 具有`isThreadSafe`設定為`false`。 with `isThreadSafe` set to `false`.| 您可以使用 lambda 運算式來指定的 factory 方法。You can use a lambda expression to specify the factory method. 這會在一個位置中保留所有初始化程式碼。This keeps all the initialization code in one place. Lambda 運算式會擷取的內容，包括任何您傳遞給延遲初始化的物件建構函式的引數。The lambda expression captures the context, including any arguments you pass to the lazily initialized object's constructor. **例外狀況快取**當您使用 factory 方法時，會快取例外狀況。**Exception caching** When you use factory methods, exceptions are cached. 也就是說，如果的 factory 方法，就會擲回的例外狀況的第一個時間的執行緒嘗試存取屬性物件，每個後續的嘗試都會擲回相同的例外狀況。That is, if the factory method throws an exception the first time a thread tries to access the property of the object, the same exception is thrown on every subsequent attempt. 這可確保每次呼叫屬性會產生相同的結果，並避免不同的執行緒取得不同的結果可能會引起的細微錯誤。This ensures that every call to the property produces the same result and avoids subtle errors that might arise if different threads get different results. 代表實際`T`，否則會初始化後在某個較早的時間點，通常會在啟動期間。The stands in for an actual `T` that otherwise would have been initialized at some earlier point, usually during startup. 在該較早的時間點失敗是通常嚴重。A failure at that earlier point is usually fatal. 如果沒有可復原的失敗可能，建議您 （在此情況下，處理站方法），在初始化常式到建置重試邏輯，就像您一樣如果您未使用延遲初始設定。If there is a potential for a recoverable failure, we recommend that you build the retry logic into the initialization routine (in this case, the factory method), just as you would if you weren't using lazy initialization. **鎖定的替代方法**在某些情況下，您可能想要避免的額外負荷物件的預設鎖定行為。**Alternative to locking** In certain situations, you might want to avoid the overhead of the object's default locking behavior. 在罕見的情況下，可能會有可能會有死結。In rare situations, there might be a potential for deadlocks. 在這種情況下，您可以使用或是建構函式，並指定。In such cases, you can use the or constructor, and specify . 這可讓物件，以在每個有數個執行緒上建立一份延遲初始化的物件，如果執行緒呼叫屬性同時。This enables the object to create a copy of the lazily initialized object on each of several threads if the threads call the property simultaneously. 物件可確保所有執行緒使用相同的執行個體的延遲初始化的物件，並捨棄未使用的執行個體。The object ensures that all threads use the same instance of the lazily initialized object and discards the instances that are not used. 因此，減少鎖定負擔的成本是物件的您的程式可能有時建立和捨棄的高度耗費資源的額外複本。Thus, the cost of reducing the locking overhead is that your program might sometimes create and discard extra copies of an expensive object. 在大部分情況下，這是不太可能項目。In most cases, this is unlikely. 範例和建構函式都會表現此行為。The examples for the and constructors demonstrate this behavior. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您指定，例外狀況會永遠不會快取，即使您指定的 factory 方法。When you specify , exceptions are never cached, even if you specify a factory method. **對等的建構函式**除了會啟用，則和建構函式可以複製的其他建構函式的功能。**Equivalent constructors** In addition to enabling the use of , the and constructors can duplicate the functionality of the other constructors. 下表顯示參數值會產生對等的行為。The following table shows the parameter values that produce equivalent behavior. |若要建立物件To create a object that is|針對具有建構函式`LazyThreadSafetyMode``mode`參數，設定`mode`至For constructors that have a `LazyThreadSafetyMode` `mode` parameter, set `mode` to|針對具有布林值的建構函式`isThreadSafe`參數，設定`isThreadSafe`至For constructors that have a Boolean `isThreadSafe` parameter, set `isThreadSafe` to|針對沒有執行緒安全性參數的建構函式For constructors with no thread safety parameters| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------| |完全具備執行緒安全;會使用鎖定來確保只有一個執行緒初始化值。Fully thread safe; uses locking to ensure that only one thread initializes the value.||`true`|所有這類建構函式都完全是安全執行緒。All such constructors are fully thread safe.| |不具備執行緒安全。Not thread safe.||`false`|不適用。Not applicable.| |完全具備執行緒安全;執行緒競爭，來初始化值。Fully thread safe; threads race to initialize the value.||不適用。Not applicable.|不適用。Not applicable.| **其他功能**如需有關使用資訊執行緒靜態欄位或屬性的備份存放區，請參閱[延遲初始設定](~/docs/framework/performance/lazy-initialization.md)。**Other capabilities** For information about the use of with thread-static fields, or as the backing store for properties, see [Lazy Initialization](~/docs/framework/performance/lazy-initialization.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以提供從多個執行緒存取的延遲初始設定。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to provide lazy initialization with access from multiple threads. > [!NOTE] > 此範例會使用建構函式。The example uses the constructor. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定`true`for `isThreadSafe`) 和建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只需變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. > > 如需示範例外狀況的範例快取使用相同的建構函式，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates exception caching using the same constructors, see the constructor. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 程式碼的四個金鑰各節將說明建立初始設定式、 factory 方法，實際的初始化和的建構函式`LargeObject`類別，建立物件時，會顯示訊息。The four key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the factory method, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which displays a message when the object is created. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] Factory 方法顯示如何建立物件，以進行進一步的初始化預留位置：The factory method shows the creation of the object, with a placeholder for further initialization: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#factoryfunc)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#factoryfunc)] 請注意，使用 lambda 函式，無法合併前, 兩個程式碼區段，如下所示：Note that the first two code sections could be combined by using a lambda function, as shown here: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#InitWithLambda](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/lambda.cs#initwithlambda)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#InitWithLambda](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/lambda.vb#initwithlambda)] 此範例會暫停，表示沒有期限在延遲初始設定之前，可能需要經過之後。The example pauses, to indicate that an indeterminate period may elapse before lazy initialization occurs. 當您按下**Enter**索引鍵，此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒。When you press the **Enter** key, the example creates and starts three threads. `ThreadProc`方法，可由所有三個執行緒呼叫屬性。The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property. 發生這種情況，第一次`LargeObject`建立執行個體：The first time this happens, the `LargeObject` instance is created: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 建構函式`LargeObject`類別，其中包含程式碼的最後一節，顯示一則訊息，並記錄初始化執行緒的身分識別。The constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which includes the last key section of code, displays a message and records the identity of the initializing thread. 程式的輸出會顯示完整的程式碼清單的結尾。The output from the program appears at the end of the full code listing. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#largector)] > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1/vb/example.vb#all)]

threadsafe.span: 根據預設，所有的 public 和 protected 成員的類別都是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: By default, all public and protected members of the class are thread safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: （選擇性） 和每個執行個體，使用此類型的建構函式的參數，可能會移除這些執行緒安全性保證。

span.span: These thread-safety guarantees may be removed optionally and per instance, using parameters to the type's constructors.
Lazy Initialization

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 發生延遲初始設定時，會使用目標類型的預設建構函式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the default constructor of the target type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式來建立執行個體可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。An instance that is created with this constructor may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. A會使用這個建構函式建立的執行個體不會快取例外狀況。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 它也說明如何使用建構函式 (指定`true`for `isThreadSafe`) 和建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also illustrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只需變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 在此範例中的程式碼的兩個關鍵程式碼會建立初始設定式和實際初始化。The two key lines of code in this example are the creation of the initializer and the actual initialization. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒上封鎖物件，如此範例可以全部一次釋放執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. `ThreadProc`方法，可由所有三個執行緒呼叫屬性來取得`LargeObject`執行個體：The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property to get the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 類別會提供鎖定，因此只有一個執行緒可建立`LargeObject`執行個體。The class provides locking, so that only one thread is allowed to create the `LargeObject` instance. 此範例會示範所有其他執行緒取得相同的執行個體。The example demonstrates that the other threads all get the same instance. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctor#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctor/vb/example.vb#all)]

span.span: Lazy Initialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isThreadSafe) cil managed

param.name: isThreadSafe
param.span: 表示這個執行個體可供多個執行緒同時使用； 表示這個執行個體一次只能供一個執行緒使用。

span.span: to make this instance usable concurrently by multiple threads; to make the instance usable by only one thread at a time.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 當延遲初始設定發生時，會使用目標類型的預設建構函式和指定的初始設定模式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the default constructor of the target type and the specified initialization mode are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體如果`isThreadSafe`是`true`; 否則模式是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is if `isThreadSafe` is `true`; otherwise, the mode is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 若要指定模式中，使用或建構函式。To specify the mode, use the or constructor. A會使用這個建構函式建立的執行個體不會快取例外狀況。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立不安全，適合所有存取延遲初始化的物件相同的執行緒上都發生的所在執行緒延遲初始設定式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that is not thread safe, for scenarios where all access to the lazily initialized object occurs on the same thread. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定如`mode`。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying for `mode`. 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只需變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructor is commented out. > [!NOTE] > 示範如何在多執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式的程式碼 (指定`true`for `isThreadSafe`)，範例，請參閱建構函式。For code that demonstrates how to use this constructor in multithreaded scenarios (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`), see the example for the constructor. 此範例會定義`LargeObject`會延遲初始化的類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily. 在 `Main`方法，此範例會建立執行個體，然後暫停。In the `Main` method, the example creates a instance and then pauses. 當您按下**Enter**鍵，此範例存取屬性執行個體，這會導致進行初始化。When you press the **Enter** key, the example accesses the property of the instance, which causes initialization to occur. 建構函式`LargeObject`類別會顯示主控台訊息。The constructor of the `LargeObject` class displays a console message. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorBool#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorbool/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorBool#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorbool/vb/example.vb#all)]

span.span: Lazy Initialization

Public Sub New (valueFactory As Func(Of T))

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 委派，需要時會叫用以產生延遲初始化的值。

span.span: The delegate that is invoked to produce the lazily initialized value when it is needed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 當延遲初始設定發生時，就會使用指定的初始化函式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the specified initialization function is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式來建立執行個體可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。An instance that is created with this constructor may be used concurrently from multiple threads. 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 所擲回的例外狀況`valueFactory`會快取。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以提供與例外狀況快取的延遲初始設定。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to provide lazy initialization with exception caching. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定`true`for `isThreadSafe`) 和建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`) and the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至不同的建構函式，只需變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to a different constructor, just change which constructors are commented out. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 程式碼的三個金鑰各節將說明建立初始設定式、 實際的初始化、 及的建構函式`LargeObject`類別，示範例外狀況快取。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which demonstrates exception caching. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads. `ThreadProc`方法，可由所有三個執行緒呼叫屬性來取得`LargeObject`執行個體：The `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads calls the property to get the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 中的建構函式`LargeObject`類別，程式碼的第三個主要區段會擲回例外狀況的第一次`LargeObject`執行個體建立，但之後可讓您進行的執行個體建立：In the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, the third key section of code throws an exception the first time a `LargeObject` instance is created, but thereafter allows instance creation to occur: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#largector)] 當範例執行時，會嘗試建立的執行個體的第一個執行緒`LargeObject`攔截失敗和例外狀況。When the example is run, the first thread that tries to create an instance of `LargeObject` fails, and the exception is caught. 您可能預期的下一個執行緒會成功地建立執行個體，但物件已快取例外狀況。You might expect that the next thread would successfully create an instance, but the object has cached the exception. 因此，所有的三個執行緒擲回例外狀況。Because of this, all three threads throw the exception. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFunc#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfunc/vb/example.vb#all)]

span.span: is .
Lazy Initialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Threading.LazyThreadSafetyMode mode) cil managed

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值會指定執行緒安全模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the thread safety mode.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這些類別會使用 的預設建構函式和指定執行緒安全模式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the default constructor of and the specified thread-safety mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的執行個體描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode of a instance describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. A會使用這個建構函式建立的執行個體不會快取例外狀況。A instance that is created with this constructor does not cache exceptions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立可讓多個執行緒會爭相延遲建立物件的延遲初始設定式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that enables multiple threads to race to create an object lazily. 多個執行緒可能會成功建立執行個體，但所有執行緒都使用的第一次建立的執行個體。Multiple threads might succeed in creating instances, but all threads use the instance that was created first. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例，示範如何在單一執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式 (指定for `mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor in single-threaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 如需範例，示範如何使用這個建構函式提供鎖定而不多執行緒案例中的競爭情形 (指定for `mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor to provide locking instead of race conditions in multithreaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 此範例會定義`LargeObject`會由數個執行緒的任何延遲初始化的類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by any of several threads. 程式碼的三個主要區段說明建立初始設定式、 實際的初始化和建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor and finalizer of the `LargeObject` class. 在開頭`Main`方法，此範例會建立執行的延遲初始化物件`LargeObject`:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the object that performs lazy initialization of the `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒上封鎖物件，如此範例可以全部一次釋放執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. 在 `ThreadProc`方法，可由所有的三個執行緒，呼叫屬性會建立`LargeObject`執行個體：In the `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads, calling the property creates the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 因為的建構函式指定執行個體，允許所有的三個執行緒建立`LargeObject`執行個體。Because the constructor for the instance specified , all three threads are allowed to create `LargeObject` instances. 此範例會示範這藉由顯示主控台訊息，在建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別：The example demonstrates this by displaying console messages in the constructor and in the finalizer of the `LargeObject` class: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#ctorfinalizer)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#ctorfinalizer)] 不過，物件可確保該只有一個執行個體由所有執行緒。However, the object ensures that only one instance is used by all threads. 範例輸出會顯示所有的三個執行緒使用相同的執行個體，以及顯示其他兩個執行個體都可以回收進行回收。The output from the example shows that all three threads use the same instance, and also shows that the other two instances can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorltsm/vb/example.vb#all)]

span.span: contains an invalid value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(!T value) cil managed
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Func`1<!T> valueFactory, bool isThreadSafe) cil managed
Public Sub New (valueFactory As Func(Of T), isThreadSafe As Boolean)

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 委派，需要時會叫用以產生延遲初始化的值。

span.span: The delegate that is invoked to produce the lazily initialized value when it is needed.

param.name: isThreadSafe
param.span: 表示這個執行個體可供多個執行緒同時使用； 表示這個執行個體一次只能供一個執行緒使用。

span.span: to make this instance usable concurrently by multiple threads; to make this instance usable by only one thread at a time.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 當延遲初始設定發生時，會使用指定的初始化函式和初始化模式。

span.span: When lazy initialization occurs, the specified initialization function and initialization mode are used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的會使用這個建構函式初始化的執行個體如果`isThreadSafe`是`true`; 否則模式是。The thread safety mode of a instance that is initialized with this constructor is if `isThreadSafe` is `true`; otherwise, the mode is . 執行緒安全模式描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 若要指定模式中，使用或建構函式。To specify the mode, use the or constructor. 所擲回的例外狀況`valueFactory`會快取。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式，以提供例外狀況快取，在案例中，以單一執行緒延遲初始設定。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to provide lazy initialization with exception caching, in a scenario with a single thread. 它也示範如何使用建構函式 (指定如`mode`)。It also demonstrates the use of the constructor (specifying for `mode`). 若要切換至該建構函式，只需變更的建構函式標記為註解。To switch to that constructor, just change which constructor is commented out. > [!NOTE] > 示範如何在多執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式的程式碼 (指定`true`for `isThreadSafe`)，範例，請參閱建構函式。For code that demonstrates how to use this constructor in multithreaded scenarios (specifying `true` for `isThreadSafe`), see the example for the constructor. 這個範例定義將由多個執行緒中的一個執行延遲初始化的 `LargeObject` 類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by one of several threads. 程式碼的三個金鑰各節將說明建立初始設定式、 實際的初始化、 及的建構函式`LargeObject`類別，示範例外狀況快取。The three key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, and the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, which demonstrates exception caching. 在 `Main` 方法的開頭，此範例會為 `LargeObject` 建立安全執行緒延遲初始設定式:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the thread-safe lazy initializer for `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 在建構函式，呼叫`isThreadSafe`參數是`false`，因此不是安全執行緒。In the call to the constructor, the `isThreadSafe` parameter is `false`, so the is not thread safe. 因為它不是安全執行緒，此範例會呼叫三次的相同執行緒上的屬性：Because it's not thread safe, the example calls the property three times on the same thread: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 中的建構函式`LargeObject`類別，程式碼的第三個主要區段會擲回例外狀況的第一次`LargeObject`執行個體建立，但之後可讓您進行的執行個體建立：In the constructor of the `LargeObject` class, the third key section of code throws an exception the first time a `LargeObject` instance is created, but thereafter allows instance creation to occur: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#largector)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#LargeCtor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#largector)] 當範例執行時，第一次嘗試建立的執行個體`LargeObject`攔截失敗和例外狀況。When the example is run, the first attempt to create an instance of `LargeObject` fails, and the exception is caught. 您所料下, 一步 嘗試將會成功，但物件已快取例外狀況。You might expect that the next attempt would succeed, but the object has cached the exception. 因為這個緣故，所有的三次嘗試會擲回例外狀況。Because of this, all three attempts throw the exception. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncBool#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncbool/vb/example.vb#all)]

param.name: valueFactory
param.span: 委派，需要時會叫用以產生延遲初始化的值。

span.span: The delegate that is invoked to produce the lazily initialized value when it is needed.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個列舉值會指定執行緒安全模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the thread safety mode.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，此類別使用的是指定的初始化函數和執行緒安全模式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the specified initialization function and thread-safety mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行緒安全模式的執行個體描述的行為，當多個執行緒嘗試初始化執行個體。The thread safety mode of a instance describes the behavior when multiple threads try to initialize the instance. 所擲回的例外狀況`valueFactory`會快取，除非`mode`是。Exceptions that are thrown by `valueFactory` are cached, unless `mode` is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別或 列舉型別。For more information, see the class or the enumeration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個建構函式來建立可讓多個執行緒會爭相延遲建立物件的延遲初始設定式。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create a lazy initializer that enables multiple threads to race to create an object lazily. 多個執行緒可能會成功建立執行個體，但所有執行緒都使用的第一次建立的執行個體。Multiple threads might succeed in creating instances, but all threads use the instance that was created first. 此外，此範例示範的例外狀況在當您指定會永遠不會快取，即使會由延遲建立型別的預設建構函式執行而不是函式所初始化。In addition, the example demonstrates that exceptions are never cached when you specify , even if initialization is performed by a function instead of by the default constructor of the lazily created type. > [!NOTE] > 如需範例，示範如何在單一執行緒案例中使用這個建構函式 (指定for `mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor in single-threaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 如需範例，示範如何使用這個建構函式提供鎖定而不多執行緒案例中的競爭情形 (指定for `mode`)，請參閱建構函式。For an example that demonstrates how to use this constructor to provide locking instead of race conditions in multithreaded scenarios (specifying for `mode`), see the constructor. 此範例會定義`LargeObject`會由數個執行緒的任何延遲初始化的類別。The example defines a `LargeObject` class that will be initialized lazily by any of several threads. 四個重要小節的程式碼說明建立初始設定式、 實際的初始化、 初始化函式和建構函式和完成項`LargeObject`類別。The four key sections of code illustrate the creation of the initializer, the actual initialization, the initialization function, and the constructor and finalizer of the `LargeObject` class. 在開頭`Main`方法，此範例會建立執行的延遲初始化物件`LargeObject`:At the beginning of the `Main` method, the example creates the object that performs lazy initialization of the `LargeObject`: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#newlazy)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#NewLazy](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#newlazy)] 延遲初始設定式會使用函式，執行初始化。The lazy initializer uses a function to perform the initialization. 函式在此情況下，是需要因為沒有任何預設建構函式`LargeObject`類別。In this case, a function is required because there is no default constructor for the `LargeObject` class. 此範例會建立並啟動三個執行緒上封鎖物件，如此範例可以全部一次釋放執行緒。The example creates and starts three threads that block on a object, so that the example can release the threads all at once. 在 `ThreadProc`方法，可由所有的三個執行緒，呼叫屬性會建立`LargeObject`執行個體：In the `ThreadProc` method that's used by all three threads, calling the property creates the `LargeObject` instance: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#valueprop)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#ValueProp](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#valueprop)] 延遲初始設定函式呼叫來建立在第三個主要區段中的程式碼，`LargeObject`執行個體。In the third key section of code, the lazy initialization function is called to create the `LargeObject` instance. 此函式會擲回例外狀況的第一次呼叫時：The function throws an exception the first time it's called: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#factoryfunc)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#FactoryFunc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#factoryfunc)] 使用任何其他設定，初始化函式處理的例外狀況會快取。With any other setting, an unhandled exception in the initialization function would be cached. 不過，抑制例外狀況快取。However, suppresses exception caching. 範例的輸出中會示範在後續的嘗試將物件初始化成功。The output from the example demonstrates that a subsequent attempt to initialize the object succeeds. > [!NOTE] > 例外狀況訊息通常會出現訊息指出其他執行緒已成功地初始化物件之後。The exception message usually appears after messages indicating that other threads have successfully initialized the object. 這是因為擲回和攔截例外狀況時導入的延遲。This is because of the delay introduced by throwing and catching the exception. 因為的建構函式指定執行個體，允許所有的三個執行緒建立`LargeObject`執行個體。Because the constructor for the instance specified , all three threads are allowed to create `LargeObject` instances. 此範例會示範這藉由顯示主控台訊息，在建構函式和完成項的`LargeObject`類別：The example demonstrates this by displaying console messages in the constructor and in the finalizer of the `LargeObject` class: [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#ctorfinalizer)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#CtorFinalizer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#ctorfinalizer)] 物件可確保該只有一個執行個體 （除了其中的初始化函式會擲回例外狀況的執行緒） 的所有執行緒都使用。The object ensures that only one instance is used by all threads (except the thread where the initialization function throws an exception). 範例輸出顯示這點。The output from the example shows this. > [!NOTE] > 為了簡化，這個範例使用 的全域執行個體，而且所有方法都是 `static` (Visual Basic 中為 `Shared`)。For simplicity, this example uses a global instance of , and all the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 這些不是使用延遲初始設定的必要項。These are not requirements for the use of lazy initialization. [!code-csharp[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/cs/example.cs#all)] [!code-vb[System.Lazy\`1.ctorFuncLTSM#All](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.lazy`1.ctorfuncltsm/vb/example.vb#all)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsValueCreated As Boolean
public: property bool IsValueCreated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出某個值是否已經建立這個 執行個體。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a value has been created for this instance.

value.span: 如果已為這個 執行個體建立了值，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a value has been created for this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當延遲初始設定發生執行個體，它可能會導致所建立的值或擲回例外狀況。When lazy initialization occurs for a instance, it may result in either a value being created or an exception being thrown. 如果有例外狀況的擲回，後續行為取決於例外狀況快取是否作用中的執行個體。If an exception is thrown, subsequent behavior of the instance depends on whether exception caching is in effect. 如果使用建構函式未指定的初始化函式中，建立執行個體，則例外狀況快取為非作用中。If the instance was created by using a constructor that does not specify an initialization function, then exception caching is not in effect. 在後續的嘗試，初始化可能會成功，並在成功初始化之後屬性會傳回`true`。A subsequent attempt to initialize the might succeed, and after successful initialization the property returns `true`. 如果初始化函式建立執行個體 (所指定`valueFactory`參數建構函式)，則例外狀況快取會受到執行緒安全模式。If the instance was created with an initialization function (specified by the `valueFactory` parameter of the constructor), then exception caching is controlled by the thread safety mode. - 如果模式是或是，沒有初始化任何第二次機會執行個體。If the mode is or , there is no second chance to initialize the instance. 如果發生例外狀況，並且初始化函式中未處理，該例外狀況快取並重新擲回的後續存取屬性。If an exception occurs and is unhandled in the initialization function, that exception is cached and rethrown on subsequent accesses of the property. 如果發生例外狀況，因此在此情況下，任何值則會建立傳回`false`。No value is created if an exception is thrown, so in such cases returns `false`. - 如果模式是，成功地執行的初始化函式 （或預設建構函式） 的第一個執行緒會建立值執行個體。If the mode is , the first thread that succeeds in running the initialization function (or the default constructor) creates the value for the instance. 如果初始化函式擲回例外狀況，在一個執行緒上，其他執行緒仍可嘗試初始化執行個體。If the initialization function throws an exception on one thread, other threads can still try to initialize the instance. 會建立值，直到屬性會傳回`false`。Until the value is created, the property returns `false`.

span.span: Lazy Initialization

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 建立並傳回這個執行個體之 屬性的字串表示。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the property for this instance.

returns.span: 在這個執行個體的 屬性上呼叫 方法的結果 (如果已建立值) (亦即，如果 屬性傳回 )。

span.span: The result of calling the method on the property for this instance, if the value has been created (that is, if the property returns ).

returns.span: 否則為表示尚未建立值的字串。

span.span: Otherwise, a string indicating that the value has not been created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法不會初始化。Calling this method does not cause initialization. 屬性可以是`null`延遲初始設定，如果這是 factory 方法之後指定`valueFactory`參數， ，或建構函式會傳回`null`。The property can be `null` after lazy initialization if the factory method that was specified for the `valueFactory` parameter of the , , or constructor returns `null`.

span.span: The property is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As T
public: property T Value { T get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 執行個體的延遲初始化值。

span.span: Gets the lazily initialized value of the current instance.

value.span: 目前 執行個體的延遲初始化值。

span.span: The lazily initialized value of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`，存取屬性強制執行初始化。If the property is `false`, accessing the property forces initialization. 除了所列的例外狀況屬性可能會擲回任何未處理的例外狀況傳遞至的 factory 方法所擲回`valueFactory`的參數， ，或建構函式。In addition to the exceptions that are listed, the property can throw any unhandled exception that is thrown by the factory method that was passed to the `valueFactory` parameter of the , , or constructor.

exception.span: 執行個體初始化為使用延遲初始化之類型的預設建構函式，且存取建構函式的權限已遺失。

span.span: The instance is initialized to use the default constructor of the type that is being lazily initialized, and permissions to access the constructor are missing.

exception.span: 執行個體初始化為使用延遲初始化之類型的預設建構函式，且該類型未具有公用無參數的建構函式。

span.span: The instance is initialized to use the default constructor of the type that is being lazily initialized, and that type does not have a public, parameterless constructor.

exception.span: 初始化函式嘗試存取此執行個體上的 。

span.span: The initialization function tries to access on this instance.
Lazy Initialization
